title: Remote Mathematics Education Broadcast Design: Case Study-Based Pedagogical Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in designing mathematics broadcast content optimized for non-real-time remote education using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more instructional design principles for effectively delivering mathematical concepts in broadcast environments
Learners can design content structures (introduction-development-conclusion) for remote math education broadcasts based on case studies
Learners can produce one practical broadcast-ready math education scenario through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
